title: Cozy Logan Square Studio off Milwaukee w/HWF|Multi Closets|Cats Ok!
posting_body:
['Studio available!', 'Property Address', '2737 N. Spaulding | 315 | Chicago, IL 60647', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'M. Fishman & Co.', '
', 'Description
', ' Features here include a large living space, built in closets, brand new windows with great natural light, hardwood floors and updated kitchens.', 'The building features intercom entry, security system, easy street parking and is just steps from the Logan Square Blue Line station and Milwaukee Avenue bus.', 'The building has a superior location near dining, entertainment and night life in Logan Square.', '$350 move in fee, no security deposit.', 'Please call or text Nick @ 708.612.1063 to set an appointment!', 'Cats Only.', '
